name: 범죄 이력
text: Clint Barton 플레이어에게 이 카드를 줍니다. 당신은 일상 형태로 카드를 뒤집어도 됩니다. 다음 중 하나를 선택합니다. • Clint Barton를 소진 → 이 카드를 게임에서 제거. • 플레이 영역에서 Hawkeye 활을 버립니다. 이 의무 카드를 버립니다.

name: Crossfire
text:
속공. Crossfire의 공격은 관통을 얻습니다.
[star] Boost: 이 강화 능력이 공격 중에 해결되면, 이 공격은 관통을 얻습니다.

name: 죽음의 표식
text: 공개될 때: Clint Barton플레이어는 자신의 손, 덱, 버린 더미, 플레이 영역에서 Mockingbird를 찾아 앞면으로 이 카드 밑에 놓습니다. 이 음모가 격파될 때, Mockingbird를 소유자의 손으로 되돌립니다.

name: Crossfire 라이플
text: Crossfire에게 장착합니다. 그럴 수 없다면, 빌런에게 장착합니다. [star] 장착된 적이 공격할 때, 이 공격은 원거리를 얻습니다. 히어로 행동: 당신의 히어로를 소진하고 [wild] 자원을 소모 → Crossfire 라이플을 버림

flavor: "난 목표를 쏘기 전에 목표가 조금 도망치게 두는 걸 좋아하지." -- Crossfire
name: 저격수의 한 발
text: 공개될 때(일상): 주요 음모에 위협을 3만큼 놓습니다. 공개될 때(히어로): 당신의 히어로가 피해 3점을 입습니다.

name: 변동하는 충성심
text: Jessica Drew 플레이어에게 이 카드를 줍니다. • Jessica Drew를 소진 → 변동하는 충성심을 게임에서 제거. • 주요 음모에 위협을 3만큼 놓습니다. 이 의무 카드를 버립니다.

flavor: "집에 돌아올 시간이야, Jessica."
name: Viper
text:
Viper가 당신과 교전 중인 동안, 당신의 손 크기가 1만큼 감소합니다.
(Spider-Woman의 숙적 하수인.)

flavor: Viper는 힘을 얻는 대가로 모든 것을 하이드라에게 바쳤어.
name: Viper의 야망
text: 공개될 때: 이 카드에 위협을 1 [per_hero] 만큼 추가로 놓습니다.

flavor: "대체 어떤 유형의 사람이 테러 단체에 가입해서 세계정복을 꿈꾸는지 가만히 생각해 보면, 하이드라 병사들은 그렇게 인상 깊지는 앞아." -- Jessica Drew
name: 하이드라 직업군인
text: 진척 1(이 카드가 공개되면, 주요 음모에 위협을 1만큼 놓습니다)..

name: 헤일 하이드라!
text: 공개될 때: 각 [[하이드라]] 하수인이 교전 중인 히어로를 공격합니다. 이렇게 공격받지 않은 각 플레이어는 조우 덱과 버린 조우 더미에서 [[하이드라]] 하수인 하나를 찾아 그 플레이어와 교전 중인 채로 플레이 영역에 내려놓습니다. 조우 덱을 찾았다면, 조우 덱을 섞습니다.

flavor: "I consider myself a craftsman. I specialize in destruction and terror."
name: Crossbones
text: While Crossbones has a [[Weapon]] attachment, his attacks gain piercing. (Discard any tough status cards from the target before dealing damage.)

name: Crossbones
text: [star] While Crossbones has a [[Weapon]] attachment, his attacks gain piercing. When Revealed: Search the encounter deck and discard pile for Crossbone's Machine Gun and attach it to Crossbones. Shuffle the encounter deck.

flavor: "Those super-powered types might have more strength, but none of them have my style."
name: Crossbones
text: [star] While Crossbones has a [[Weapon]] attachment, his attacks gain piercing. When Revealed: Reveal the top card of the Experimental Weapons deck.

flavor: Crossbones is leading an army of Hydra soldiers in a direct assault on the Project P.E.G.A.S.U.S. facility in the Adirondack Mountains.
name: Attack on Mount Athena

flavor: Inside the Project P.E.G.A.S.U.S. facility, S.H.I.E.L.D. agents fight desperately to prevent Hydra from obtaining the Reality Stone stored within.
name: The Infinity Stone
The Infinity Stone
text: When Revealed: Reveal the top card of the Experimental Weapons deck.

flavor: Hydra has seized the Infinity Stone, and Crossbones orders their withdrawal. You must stop them before they escape!
name: The Getaway
The Getaway
text: When Revealed: Reveal the top card of the Experimental Weapons deck. If this stage is completed, the players lose the game.

name: Crossbones' Machine Gun
text: Attach to Crossbones. Uses (2[per_hero] ammo counters). [star] Forced Interrupt: When Crossbones attacks you, remove 1 ammo counter from this card and discard the top card of the encounter deck → take indirect damage equal to the number of boost icons on the discarded card.

name: Crossbones' Armor
text: Attach to Crossbones. Forced Interrupt: When Crossbones would take any amount of damage, place it here instead. If there is 5 or more damage here, discard Crossbones' Armor.

flavor: "I know that if you cut off one head, two more will take its place. But what if it blows up instead?" -- She-Hulk
name: Hydra Bomber
text: When Revealed: Choose to either take 2 damage or place 1 threat on the main scheme.

name: Full Auto
text: When Revealed (Alter-Ego): Surge. When Revealed (Hero): Discard X cards from the top of the encounter deck, where X is Crossbones' ATK. Take 1 indirect damage for each boost icon discarded this way.

name: Hard as Nails
text:
When Revealed: Give the villain a tough status card. If you cannot, heal 3 damage from it instead.
[star] Boost: Give the villain a tough status card. If you cannot, heal 3 damage from it instead.

name: Raid the Armory
text: Incite 1. (When this card is revealed place 1 threat on the main scheme.) When Revealed: Discard cards from the top of the encounter deck until a [[Weapon]] attachment is discarded. Reveal that card.

flavor: Crossbones is a heartless killer, but he's not a psychopath. His assault on P.E.G.A.S.U.S. is ruthless and efficient.
name: Crossbones' Assault
text: When Defeated: Crossbones activates against the player who defeated this scheme.

flavor: Hydra is rounding up P.E.G.A.S.U.S. staff to hold as hostages.
name: Cornered Staff
text: When Revealed: Discard 1[per_hero] cards from the top of the encounter deck. Place 1 additional threat here for each boost icon discarded this way.

name: Laser Rifle
text: Attach to the Villain. [star] Forced Interrupt: When attached villain attacks, the attack gains ranged. Hero Action: Spend [energy][physical] resources → discard this card.

flavor: "You're never going to convince Cap that an energy shield is as good as his old frisbee." -- Carol Danvers
name: Energy Shield
text: Attach to the villain. Attached villain gains retaliate 1. Hero Action: Spend [energy][mental] resources → discard this card.

name: Power Gauntlets
text: Attach to the Villain. [star] Forced Response: After the attached villain attacks and damages you, discard 1 card from your hand. Hero Action: Spend [mental][physical] resources → discard this card.

flavor: "I never should have shared my tech with S.H.I.E.L.D." -- Tony Stark
name: Exo-Suit
text: Attach to the villain. Hero Action: Spend [energy][mental][physical] resources → discard this card.

flavor: "You know I beat Thor once? Picture that: Crusher Creel standing over the God of Thunder, and you think you scare me?"
name: Absorbing Man
text: Absorbing Man gains the trait of each environment in play.

name: Absorbing Man
text: Absorbing Man gains the trait of each environment in play. When Revealed: If Super Absorbing Power is in play, deal 1 encounter card to each player. Otherwise, search the encounter deck and discard pile for Super Absorbing Power and reveal it. Shuffle the encounter deck if it was searched this way.

name: Absorbing Man
text: Absorbing Man gains the trait of each environment in play. [star] Forced Response: After Absorbing Man activates against you, if he has the: • [[Ice]] or [[Stone]] trait, place 1 threat on the main scheme. • [[Metal]] or [[Wood]] trait, take 1 indirect damage.

name: None Shall Pass
text: Contents: Absorbing Man (I) and Absorbing Man (II). Absorbing Man and Standard encounter sets. One modular encounter set (Hydra Patrol). Setup: Discard cards from the encounter deck until an environment is discarded. Put that card into play and shuffle the encounter discard pile into the encounter deck.

name: None Shall Pass
text: [star] Forced Response: After resolving step one of the villain phase, place 1 delay counter here. Forced Interrupt: When an environment enters play, discard each other environment card in play. If this stage is completed, the players lose the game.

name: Dense Forest
text:
Surge. Forced Response: After Absorbing Man makes an undefended attack against you, take 1 indirect damage (2 indirect damage instead if there are 5 or more delay counters on the main scheme).
[star] Boost: Put this card into play.

name: Snowy Hillside
text:
Surge. Forced Response: After Absorbing Man makes an undefended attack against you, place 1 threat on the main scheme (2 threat instead if there are 5 or more delay counters on the main scheme).
[star] Boost: Put this card into play.

name: Rocky Outcrop
text:
Surge. Forced Response: After Absorbing Man makes an undefended attack against you, heal 1 damage from him (2 damage instead if there are 5 or more delay counters on the main scheme).
[star] Boost: Put this card into play.

name: Abandoned Facility
text:
Surge. Forced Response: After Absorbing Man makes an undefended attack against you, discard 1 resource icon from your hand (2 resources instead if there are 5 or more delay counters on the main scheme).
[star] Boost: Put this card into play.

name: Ball and Chain
text:
Attach to Absorbing Man. Hero Action: Spend a [physical] resource → shuffle this card into the encounter deck.
[star] Boost: Reveal this card.

name: Stall Tactics
text:
When Revealed: Place 1 threat on the main scheme for every 2 delay counters on the main scheme. If no threat was placed this way, this card gains surge.
[star] Boost: If there are 5 or more delay counters on the main scheme, take 1 indirect damage.

name: Swinging Stone
text: When Revealed (Alter-Ego): Absorbing Man schemes. If Absorbing Man has the [[Stone]] trait, he gets +1 SCH for this activation. When Revealed (Hero): Absorbing Man attacks you. If Absorbing Man has the [[Stone]] trait, he gets +1 ATK for this activation.

name: Steel Kick
text: When Revealed (Alter-Ego): Place 2 threat on the main scheme (3 threat instead if Absorbing Man has the [[Metal]] trait.) When Revealed (Hero): Take 3 indirect damage (4 indirect damage instead if Absorbing Man has the [[Metal]] trait.)

name: Piercing Thorns
text:
When Revealed: Discard 1 card at random from your hand. If Absorbing Man has the [[Wood]] trait, discard 1 card you control.
[star] Boost: If Absorbing Man has the [[Stone]] or [[Wood]] trait, you are stunned.

name: Omni-Morph Duplication
text: When Revealed: If Absorbing Man has the: - [[Ice]] trait, exhaust your identity. - [[Metal]] trait, give Absorbing Man a tough status card and heal 1 damage from him. - [[Stone]] trait, give Absorbing Man 1 facedown boost card. - [[Wood]] trait, discard 1 card at random from your hand.

name: Icy Grip
text:
When Revealed: You are stunned. If Absorbing Man has the [[Ice]] trait, take 2 indirect damage.
[star] Boost: If Absorbing Man has the [[Ice]] or [[Metal]] trait, give him a tough status card.

name: Avalanche!
text: When Revealed: Each Player must choose to either spend a [energy] resource or take 2 indirect damage (3 indirect damage instead if there are 5 or more delay counters on the main scheme.)

flavor: Creel has the ability to absorb the properties of multiple elements at once, but it requires intense concentration.
name: Super Absorbing Power
text:
Absorbing Man gains the [[Ice]], [[Metal]], [[Stone]], and [[Wood]] traits.
[star] Boost: Reveal this card.

flavor: "There's nothing you can do that I can't do better."
name: Taskmaster
text: Forced Response: After a player changes to hero form, they discard the top card of the encounter deck and take damage equal to the number of boost icons on that card.

name: Taskmaster
text: When Revealed: Deal each player an encounter card. Forced Response: After a player changes to hero form, they discard the top card of the encounter deck and take damage equal to the number of boost icons on that card.

name: Taskmaster
text: When Revealed: Deal each player an encounter card. Forced Response: After a player changes to hero form, they discard the top card of the encounter deck and take damage equal to the number of boost icons on that card.

name: Hunting Down Heroes
text: Contents: Taskmaster (I) and Taskmaster (II). Taskmaster, Hydra Patrol, and Standard encounter sets. One modular encounter set (Weapon Master). Setup: Set each [[Captive]] ally aside out of play. Search the encounter deck for Hydra Patrol and put it into play. Shuffle the encounter deck.

flavor: The notorious Taskmaster has been appointed by Hydra's chief of police. His top priority is hunting down the outlaw heroes.
name: Hunting Down Heroes
text: [star] Forced Response: After resolving step one of the villain phase, each player in hero form must choose to either place 1 threat here or take 1 damage. If this stage is completed, the players lose the game.

flavor: "Hydra took over so fast, I wasn't sure they were real."
name: Moon Knight
text: Response: After you play Moon Knight from your hand, spend a [wild] resource → draw 2 cards.

name: Shang-Chi
text: Response: After you play Shang-Chi from your hand, spend a [energy] resource → stun an enemy.

name: White Tiger
text: Response: After you play White Tiger from your hand, spend [mental] resource → remove 3 threat from a scheme.

flavor: "I got caught when I tried to help some civilians escape a Hydra Patrol. Turns out the civilians were Hydra agents running a sting operation."
name: Elektra
text: Response: After you play Elektra from your hand, spend a [physical] resource → deal 3 damage to an enemy.

name: Hydra Hunter
text:
[star] Hydra's Hunter's attacks gain piercing and ranged.
[star] Boost: If you are in hero form, take 1 damage. Otherwise place 1 threat on the main scheme.

name: Taskmaster's Sword
text: Attach to Taskmaster. [star] Taskmaster's attacks gain piercing. Hero Action: Exhaust your hero and spend [mental][physical] resources → discard this card.

flavor: "I learned this move from Captain America." -- Taskmaster
name: Taskmaster's Shield
text: Attach to Taskmaster. Taskmaster gains retaliate 1. Hero Action: Exhaust your hero and spend [mental][physical] resources → discard this card.

name: Photographic Reflexes
text: Attach to Taskmaster. Forced Interrupt: when a player attacks Taskmaster, prevent all damage that would be dealt to Taskmaster and deal an equal amount of damage to that player's identity instead. Then, discard Photographic Reflexes. (Max once per attack.)

name: Mimicry
text: When Revealed (Alter-Ego): Discard the top 5 cards of your deck. If a [[Thwart]] card was discarded this way, Taskmaster schemes. When Revealed (Hero): Discard the top 5 cards of your deck. If an [[Attack]] card was discarded this way, Taskmaster attacks you.

flavor: "It's a bad time to be a hero." -- Bucky Barnes
name: Hunted by Hydra
text: Incite 1. (When this card is revealed place 1 threat on the main scheme.) When Revealed: Each player in hero form takes 1 damage and discards 1 card at random from their hand.

name: Captured by Hydra
text: When Revealed: Place 1 random set-aside [[Captive]] ally facedown beneath this scheme. When this scheme is defeated, the player who defeated it takes that ally into their hand and removes this scheme from the game.

flavor: Taskmaster only accepts the best troops into his police force. before a Hydra soldier can enlist, they must survive his training camp.
name: Taskmaster's Training Camp
text: Forced Response: After a minion enters play, give it a tough status card.

flavor: "My mutate program will transform these pathetic creatures into Hydra's elite shock-troops!"
name: Zola
text: Retaliate 1.

name: Zola
text: Retaliate 1. When Revealed: Search the encounter deck and discard pile for the Test Subjects side scheme and reveal it. (Shuffle the encounter deck.)

name: Zola
text: Retaliate 1. When Revealed: Each player searches the encounter deck and discard pile for a minion and reveals it. (Shuffle the encounter deck.)

name: The Island of Dr. Zola
text: Contents: Zola (I) and Zola (II). Zola and Standard encounter sets. One modular encounter set (Under Attack) Setup: Search the encounter deck for Hydra Prison and reveal it. Each player searches the encounter deck for a copy of Ultimate Bio-Servant and puts it into play engaged with them. Shuffle the encounter deck.

name: The Island of Dr. Zola
text: [star] Forced Response: After resolving step one of the villain phase, place 1 test counter here. Then, if there are 3 or more test counters here, discard cards from the top of the encounter deck until a minion is discarded. Put that minion into play engaged with the first player and remove 3 test counters from this scheme.

flavor: Zola's mutates attack you with blind obedience and savage fury. It's up to you to put an end to this nightmare before the mad doctor unleashes them upon the world!
name: The Mad Doctor
text: When Revealed: Each player searches the encounter deck and discard pile for a minion and reveals it. Shuffle the encounter deck.

name: The Mad Doctor
text: [star] Forced Response: After resolving step 1 of the villain phase, place 1 test counter here. Then, if there are 3 or more test counters here, discard cards from the top of the encounter deck until a minion is discarded. Put that minion into play engaged with the first player and remove 3 test counters from this scheme. If this scheme is completed, the players lose the game.

name: Ultimate Bio-Servant
text:
Toughness. [star] Ultimate Bio-Servant gets +1 ATK for each attachment on it.
[star] Boost: Give the villain a tough status card.

name: Zola's Mutate
text:
When Revealed: Discard cards from the top of the encounter deck until a [[Tech]] attachment is discarded. Attach that card to Zola's Mutate.
[star] Boost: Shuffle Zola's Mutate into the encounter deck.

name: Berserk Mutate
text:
Quickstrike.
[star] Boost: Place 1 test counter on the main scheme. For each test counter on the main scheme, Zola gets +1 SCH and +1 ATK for this activation.

name: Defensive Programming
text:
Attach to the minion with the most remaining hit points without another copy of Defensive Programming attached. If you cannot, this card gains surge.
Attached minion gets +2 hit points and gains guard.

name: Pain Inhibitors
text:
Attach to the minion with the most remaining hit points without another copy of Pain Inhibitors attached. If you cannot, this card gains surge.
Attached minion gets +2 hit points and gains retaliate 1.

name: Neurological Implants
text:
Attach to the minion with the most remaining hit points without another copy of Neurological Implants attached. If you cannot, this card gains surge.
Attached minion gets +2 hit points.

flavor: "You thought Zola defenseless? You arrogant fool!" -- Arnim Zola
name: Mind Ray
text: When Revealed (Alter-Ego): Zola schemes. You are confused. When Revealed (Hero): Zola attacks you. You are stunned.

name: Technological Enhancements
text:
Incite 1. When Revealed: Place 1 test counter on the main scheme.
[star] Boost: Place 1 test counter on the main scheme.

name: Hydra Prison
text: When Revealed: Each player searches their deck, discard pile and hand for a hero-specific ally and places it facedown beneath this scheme. Place X threat on this scheme where X is the total cost of all allies beneath it. Each player shuffles their deck. When Defeated: remove this scheme from the game and return each ally beneath it to its owner's hand.

flavor: It is a fate rose than death.
name: Test Subjects
text: When Defeated: The first player discards cards from the top of the encounter deck until they discard a minion. Reveal that minion.

flavor: The mad doctor never grows tired of experimenting on his victims.
name: Zola's Experiments
text: Forced Response: After a minion enters play, attach the topmost [[Tech]] attachment in the encounter discard pile to that minion.

flavor: "Freedom is only for the one who rules! All others must be slaves!"
name: Red Skull
text: [star] Red Skull gets +1 ATK for each side scheme in play.

flavor: "No one will stand in the way of my plans!"
name: Red Skull
text: [star] Red Skull gets +1 ATK for each side scheme in play. When Revealed: Deal each player an encounter card.

flavor: "The world will bow to Red Skull!"
name: Red Skull
text: [star] Red Skull gets +1 ATK for each side scheme in play. When Revealed: Deal each player an encounter card.

name: The Rise of the Red Skull
text: Contents: Red Skull (I) and Red Skull (II). Red Skull and Standard encounter sets. Two modular encounter sets (Hydra Assault and Hydra Patrol). Setup: Put the Red House into play. Shuffle every other side scheme into the side-scheme deck and set it next to the encounter deck (see insert). Set The Sleeper aside, out of play.

flavor: Red Skull plans to conquer the world with the power of the Reality Stone. He uses his strategic genius to keep you busy while he works towards his goal.
name: The Rise of the Red Skull
text: [star] Forced Response: After resolving step one of the villain phase, reveal the top of the side-scheme deck and put it into play.

flavor: The Red Skull is one step closer to unlocking the full power of the Infinity Stone. You need to stop him before he does, and all reality is bent to his evil will.
name: New World Hydra
text: When Revealed: Reveal the top card of the side-scheme deck and put it into play.

name: New World Hydra
text: [star] Forced Response: After resolving step one of the villain phase, reveal the top card of the side-scheme deck and put it into play. If this scheme is completed, the players lose the game.

name: The Sleeper
text: Guard. Retaliate 1. Toughness. When Revealed: The Sleeper engages the first player. When Defeated: Remove The Sleeper from the game.

flavor: "Careful, team. These guys pack a punch!" -- Captain America
name: Hydra Exo-Soldier
text:
Toughness.
[star] Boost: Give the villain a tough status card and another boost card.

name: Red Skull's Luger
text:
Attach to Red Skull. [star] Red Skull's attacks gain piercing and ranged. Hero Action: Spend [energy][mental][physical] resource → discard this card.
[star] Boost: Attach to Red Skull.

flavor: "I am your superior in every way!" -- Red Skull
name: Red Skull's Right Hook
text: Attach to Red Skull. Red Skull gains retaliate 1. Hero Action: Spend [energy][mental][physical] resources → discard this card.

flavor: "In chess, the only piece that truly matters is the King, and that's me." -- Red Skull
name: Master Strategist
text: Attach to Red Skull. [star] Forced Interrupt: When Red Skull activates, give him an additional boost card for each side scheme in play. Then, discard this card. (Max once per activation.)

flavor: The Infinity Stone gives Red Skull the power to bend reality to his will.
name: Twisted Reality
text: Incite 1. Attach to a side scheme. Forced Response: When attached side scheme is defeated, deal the first player an encounter card.

flavor: "This is the end for you, Herr Captain!" -- Red Skull
name: Bitter Rival
text:
When Revealed: Exhaust a character you control for each side scheme in play.
[star] Boost: Exhaust a character you control.

flavor: "With my great and unmatched cunning, Hydra will reign supreme!" -- Red Skull
name: Spreading Lies
text:
When Revealed: Place 2 threat on each scheme in play.
[star] Boost: Give Red Skull a tough status card.

name: Infinite Power
text: When Revealed (Alter-Ego): Give Red Skull a tough status card. Red Skull schemes. When Revealed (Hero): Give Red Skull a tough status card. Red Skull attacks you.

flavor: Red Skull built his fortress over the White House as a symbol of Hydra's conquest over America.
name: The Red House
text: Red Skull cannot take damage. Interrupt: When a character thwarts this side scheme, they may use their ATK instead of their THW.

flavor: Rising from the Potomac River, The Sleeper has awakened to answer Red Skull's summons.
name: The Sleeper Awakened
text: This scheme cannot leave play while The Sleeper is in play. When Revealed: Put The Sleeper into play engaged with the first player. When The Sleeper is defeated, remove this card from the game.

flavor: Under Hydra's rule, families are separated and incarcerated without due process.
name: Prison Camps
text: When Defeated: The player who defeated this scheme searches their deck and discard pile for an ally, puts it into play, and shuffles their deck.

flavor: Hydra controls all media outlets and uses propaganda to turn the masses against the heroes of the past.
name: Censor the Past
text: When Defeated: Each player chooses up to 3 cards in their discard pile and shuffles them into their deck.

flavor: What Hydra lacks in skill, they make up for with sheer numbers.
name: Hydra Reinforcements
text: When Defeated: The player who defeated this scheme discards a non-Elite minion.

flavor: Red Skull creates catastrophes across the country to keep his enemies busy.
name: Mass Chaos
text: When Revealed: Each player discards the top 5 cards of their deck and places 1 threat here for each different type of resource icon ([energy],[mental],[physical], or [wild]) they discarded this way.

name: Hydra Flame-Soldier
text:
[star] Forced Response: After Hydra Flame-Soldier makes an undefended attack against you, discard a support you control.
[star] Boost: If this card resolves during an undefended attack, discard a support you control.

name: Hydra Jet-Trooper
text:
Quickstrike.
[star] Boost: If you are in hero form, the villain attacks you after this activation. Do not deal any boost cards for that attack.

name: Hail Hydra!
text: When Revealed: Each [[Hydra]] minion engaged with a hero makes an attack against that hero. Each player who was not attacked this way searches the encounter deck and discard pile for a [[Hydra]] minion, puts it into play engaged with them, and shuffles the encounter deck.

name: Combat Knife
text: Attach to the villain. [star] Attached villain's attacks gain piercing. Hero Action: Spend [mental][physical] resources → discard this card.

name: Hydra Sidearm
text: Attach to the Villain. [star] Forced Interrupt: When attached villain attacks, the attack gains ranged. Hero Action: Spend [mental][physical] resources → discard this card.

name: Weapon Master
text: When Reveled (Alter-Ego): The villain schemes. If they have a [[Weapon]] attachment, this card gains surge. When Reveled (Hero): the villain attacks you. If they have a [[Weapon]] attachment, this card gains surge.

name: Concussion Grenade
text: When Revealed (Alter-Ego): You are confused. Place 1 threat on the main scheme (2 threat instead if you were already confused). When Revealed (Hero): You are stunned. Deal 1 damage to your hero (2 instead if you were already stunned).

flavor: "When you consider the kind of person would join a terrorist organization bent on world domination, it's easy to see why Hydra's troops don't impress." -- Jessica Drew
name: Hydra Regular
text: Incite 1. (When this card is revealed, place 1 threat on the main scheme.)

name: Hydra Soldier
text: Guard.(While this minion is engaged with you, you cannot attack the villain.) When Defeated: Deal the engaged player an encounter card.

flavor: Hydra Soldiers perform routine patrols to maintain control of their territory.
name: Hydra Patrol
text: When Defeated: Each player searches the encounter deck and discard pile for a [[Hydra]] minion and puts it into play engaged with them. Shuffle the encounter deck.
